overview: An application for uploading, organizing, and sharing photos, with features like tagging, album creation, and social sharing.

scenarios.name: Upload Photo
scenarios.description: Verify that a photo can be successfully uploaded.

scenarios.name: Photo Metadata Extraction
scenarios.description: Ensure that metadata (e.g., date, location) is correctly extracted from uploaded photos.

scenarios.name: Delete Photo
scenarios.description: Verify that a photo can be deleted.

scenarios.name: Edit Photo Details
scenarios.description: Ensure that users can edit details of a photo.

scenarios.name: Download Photo
scenarios.description: Ensure that users can download a photo.

scenarios.name: Photo Upload Limit
scenarios.description: Ensure that photo upload adheres to a size limit.

scenarios.name: Duplicate Photo Detection
scenarios.description: Verify that duplicate photos are detected and handled.

scenarios.name: Batch Upload Photos
scenarios.description: Ensure that users can batch upload multiple photos.

scenarios.name: Batch Delete Photos
scenarios.description: Verify that users can batch delete multiple photos.

scenarios.name: View Photo Details
scenarios.description: Verify that users can view detailed information of a photo.

scenarios.name: Photo Tagging
scenarios.description: Verify that users can add tags to photos.

scenarios.name: Tag Removal
scenarios.description: Verify that users can remove tags from photos.

scenarios.name: Create Album
scenarios.description: Ensure that users can create a new album.

scenarios.name: Add Photo to Album
scenarios.description: Verify that users can add photos to an album.

scenarios.name: Remove Photo from Album
scenarios.description: Ensure that users can remove photos from an album.

scenarios.name: Rename Album
scenarios.description: Ensure that users can rename an album.

scenarios.name: Delete Album
scenarios.description: Verify that an album can be deleted.

scenarios.name: Batch Tag Photos
scenarios.description: Ensure that users can batch tag multiple photos.

scenarios.name: Sort Photos by Date
scenarios.description: Verify that photos can be sorted by date.

scenarios.name: Sort Photos by Name
scenarios.description: Ensure that photos can be sorted by name.

scenarios.name: Share Photo
scenarios.description: Verify that users can share a photo via a shareable link.

scenarios.name: Share Album
scenarios.description: Ensure that users can share an album via a shareable link.

scenarios.name: Revoke Share Link
scenarios.description: Verify that users can revoke a shareable link.

scenarios.name: Photo Visibility Settings
scenarios.description: Verify that users can set photo visibility (public/private).

scenarios.name: Album Visibility Settings
scenarios.description: Ensure that users can set album visibility (public/private).

scenarios.name: Download Album
scenarios.description: Verify that users can download all photos in an album.

scenarios.name: Filter Photos by Album
scenarios.description: Ensure that users can filter photos by album.

scenarios.name: View Album Photos
scenarios.description: Verify that users can view all photos in an album.

scenarios.name: Album Sorting
scenarios.description: Verify that albums can be sorted by date created, name, or number of photos.

scenarios.name: Activity Feed
scenarios.description: Ensure that users can view an activity feed of recent actions (uploads, shares).

scenarios.name: Like Photo
scenarios.description: Ensure that users can like a photo.

scenarios.name: Unlike Photo
scenarios.description: Verify that users can unlike a photo.

scenarios.name: Comment on Photo
scenarios.description: Ensure that users can add comments to a photo.

scenarios.name: Edit Comment
scenarios.description: Verify that users can edit their comments.

scenarios.name: Delete Comment
scenarios.description: Ensure that users can delete their comments.

scenarios.name: View Comments
scenarios.description: Verify that users can view comments on a photo.

scenarios.name: Favorite Photo
scenarios.description: Ensure that users can mark a photo as favorite.

scenarios.name: Unfavorite Photo
scenarios.description: Verify that users can unmark a photo as favorite.

scenarios.name: View Favorite Photos
scenarios.description: Ensure that users can view all favorite photos.

scenarios.name: Notification System
scenarios.description: Verify that users receive notifications for certain actions (comments, shares).

scenarios.name: Search Photos by Tag
scenarios.description: Ensure that users can search for photos by tag.

scenarios.name: Search Photos by Date
scenarios.description: Verify that users can search for photos by date.

scenarios.name: Search Photos by Location
scenarios.description: Ensure that users can search for photos by location.

scenarios.name: Sort Photos by Tag
scenarios.description: Verify that photos can be sorted by tag.

scenarios.name: Slideshow View
scenarios.description: Verify that users can view photos in a slideshow mode.

scenarios.name: Photo Geotagging
scenarios.description: Ensure that users can add or edit geotags on a photo.

scenarios.name: Photo Resolution Settings
scenarios.description: Verify that users can set the resolution for viewing photos.

scenarios.name: Photo Editing (Crop)
scenarios.description: Ensure that users can crop a photo.

scenarios.name: Photo Editing (Rotate)
scenarios.description: Verify that users can rotate a photo.

scenarios.name: Photo Editing (Adjustments)
scenarios.description: Ensure that users can adjust photo settings (brightness, contrast).
